description:
Focused study on an instrument forms the central pillar for
the BMus Majors in piano, strings, brass, wind and
percussion. Normally undertaken in the third year of study,
this module usually follows the completion of the Junior
Recital; the first of two capstone modules in relation to the
Major. In following on from a Junior Recital, the module is
largely about beginning the process of evolution from
undergraduate study either towards graduate entry or
professional life.
title: Intermediate Studies on Principal Instrument
